participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, Emily loves expressing herself through her fashion choices and enjoys sharing her passion for music and gaming with friends.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is nurturing and passionate about her work, dedicated to her students and always looking for new ways to inspire them. She enjoys vibrant colors and has a flair for languages.
participant_2.background: my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm an elementary school teacher. my favorite colors are red and silver. i'm fluent in english spanish and french.
